message.content:
Ewe, ndiyakunceda ngendlela yokungayihlawuli irhafu ngokusemthethweni. Ndithethelele, ndizakugcwalisa. 

1. Funda kahle isaziso sokungayihlawuli irhafu: 
   a. Bhala intetho yokungayihlawuli irhafu ngokusemthethweni. 
   b. Funda kabanzi ngokuthi ungenzani uma ungayihlawuli irhafu. 
   c. Hlela intetho nezinto ezifanelekile ezikwenza ukungayihlawuli irhafu ngokusemthethweni.

2. Qhagamshelana noMphathi wendawo: 
   a. Fika esikhundleni sakho sokugcwalisa isaziso sokungayihlawuli irhafu. 
   b. Thetha naye ngokusemthethweni ngolwazi lwakho. 
   c. Phendula imibuzo yakhe ngokusemthethweni ngokwakho.

3. Zama ukubonisana nezintatheli zokungayihlawuli irhafu: 
   a. Faka inombolo yefoni yomntu ophathwayo kwi-intanethi. 
   b. Thetha naye ngokusemthethweni ngokwakho. 
   c. Phendula imibuzo yakhe ngokusemthethweni ngokwakho.

4. Qhagamshelana noMphathi wendawo ngenxa yokuhamba kwento yokungayihlawuli irhafu: 
   a. Fika esikhundleni sakho sokugcwalisa isaziso sokungayihlawuli irhafu. 
   b. Thetha naye ngokusemthethweni ngolwazi lwakho ngokuhamba kwento yokungayihlawuli irhafu. 
   c. Phendula imibuzo yakhe ngokusemthethweni ng
